title: Knockout, Titling Gothic FB and similar
content:
hello :)

i am looking for some bold/heavy fonts similar to:  
Knockout  
Titling Gothic FB  
or Giza

if you have any suggestions on similar typefaces please let me know!

thanks
author: tannenhauser

comments.content:
I'm a big fan of Bureau Grotesque and Maple above as well as the three you mentioned.

[Farao](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221212107/http:/www.stormtype.com/typefaces-fonts-shop/typefaces-199-farao-black)  
 [Grotzec Headline Condensed](http://web.archive.org/)  
 [Zeppelin](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221212107/http:/www.stormtype.com/typefaces-fonts-shop/typefaces-90-zeppelin-53-bold)

Blacker? [Fakir](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221212107/http:/www.underware.nl/site2/index.php3?id1=fakir&id2=display-black)

thanks guys! i feel like these fonts you listed are too stylized for what im looking for. something more similar to knockout and titling fb rather than the giza is what im looking for. any further suggestions? i would really appreciate it. thank you :)

You can't get any closer to Knockout than Bureau Grotesque and [Rhode](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221212107/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&searchstr=rhode). Also, [FF Bau](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221212107/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&searchstr=ff%20bau).

Check out the heavy weights of Capone, from Cake Type.

[http://www.caketype.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221212107/http:/www.caketype.com/ "http://www.caketype.com/")
